## 各学科进入ESI的阈值
```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
ThresholdESI <- readxl::read_excel("./data/thresholdESI.xlsx")
ThresholdESI %>% 
      knitr::kable( format = "latex",
                    booktabs = T, 
                    caption = "各学科进入ESI的阈值(2017年8月数据)") %>%
      kable_styling("striped")
```
